website_summaries.verdict: This soft and highly absorbent robe is a great choice that comes in a number of sizes. Definitely the best bathrobe currently available.
pros: A top choice for its soft and comfortable micro-fleece material which absorbs water extremely well and offers optimal insulation
cons: Several customers note that the sizing seems off, and many had to exchange the robe for a different size

customer_reviews.title: Large grizzly bear bath robe
customer_reviews.text: If you goal is warmth alone, and you don’t mind looking like a giant grizzly in hibernation, and are not looking to feel in anyway attractive - then this is a great night gown! I now only wear it when I’m sick as it’s super cosy, but it is by far the most unattractive garment I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Oph

customer_reviews.title: disappointing/size is extremely over-sized
customer_reviews.text: Please read reviews and believe this robe is extremely EXTREMELY oversized!!! fits two or three normal size adults. Will be returning this item. Color and fabric are lush and lovely, but unfortunately useless as a robe for adults who are looking for a robe. I am a size 16W and this is huge.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE MARIE

customer_reviews.title: O.M.G.!!!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G.!!! This has got to seriously be thee most comfortable, warm and cozy Robe I have ever owned! The thick plush material is not exactly flattering for my figure... but who cares! All that matters is it will keep me toasty warm on those cold winter mornings!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni B

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BATHROBE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bathrobe! I ordered the Dark Purple color and its amazing! This bathrobe is so comfortable and fluffy! I LOVE that it has pockets It came in a size Small/Medium and is past my knees in length (Im short though). I really like how thick it is around the collar area. It gives it such a luxurious look. It looks exactly as pictured. Shipping for my order was 1 day and it came on time. Packed good and came in perfect condition! Im definitely ordering another one just to lounge around in. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Youtube: MidnightAndI

customer_reviews.title: I figured it's better to have it too big
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was way off. I read many reviews and it was mixed, so I figured it's better to have it too big, rather than too tight because I rarely do returns. I literally look like a huge, fluffy marshmallow. It's a large/x lg, and I'm a size 12-14. Definitely, go with the medium, that is for sure. However, It IS amazing. It's fluffy and comfy and no one has to see me in it, so I don't really care that I look 2x's my size. It has been washed and held up fine, no fuzzies came off. I love it. I looked at robes in stores everywhere, and they were expensive and of lesser quality. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M.

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second one...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered up one size (lg instead of med) because I have been looking for a warm, cozy, oversized, fluffy robe since forever and always get thin pieces of...not what I was looking for. BUT THIS IS THE ONE! (FINALLY!) I bought the jacquard, since pretty much every robe pills when you wash it, and if it does eventually pill, the weave will hide it. Not sure why this received a single bad review. Get one of the jacquards, order your true size (leaning small) if you want lighter and slimmer or order a size up if you want super comfy curl up on the couch or the porch swing with coffee time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great robes
customer_reviews.text: After returning the first robe I purchased, (of a different brand) for lack of plushness, I ended up purchasing this one for my wife and she couldn’t be happier. It’s super plush, it fit as expected and she loves the color. I ended up buying two more for my daughter and granddaughter. They also love their new robes. Thinking about buying two more for my sisters. They’re fairly priced and shipping was fast as well. Can’t go wrong with this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No level of comfortable can overcome such ridiculous look
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews mentioned this robe is larger than normal. I still went ahead to place the order, thinking I can take an oversize robe so long if it's comfortable. I thought a robe a little larger is no issue since I would only wear it at home and I normally enjoy wearing loose, comfy sweaters anyways. I ordered a S/M since my normal clothing size is either 2 or 4. This robe is not only way too wide over the shoulder and chest, the plush material (though indeed comfortable thus two stars) made me looked like a big, sloppy, sad bear. This robe is not comfortable enough for me to keep.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm. Fits true to size and very comfortable. Not too thick or thin. Would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality for th Price!
customer_reviews.text: My robe came sooner than expected and was well-packaged. I Thought it may have been too big at first(2x) but I love that I have plenty of room to lounge in it and that it has nice-sized pockets that are deep and well-made. The belt also fits securely in the loopholes on each side and there's a Lil string to close both sides of the robe together. Its large lapels keep out any moisture from my hair or neck/back, etc. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase; now if I could get my husband to stop using mine even though he has his own, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve seam unraveling after less than a week!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this robe for a week, only wear it while I’m getting ready in the morning, and the stitching on the left sleeve has already come undone. It looks like it’s going to come undone further down the seam of the arm too. It’s too bad because I really loved this robe. It’s very warm and fluffy, but I don’t want a product that can’t hold up to minimal wearing for less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Alot larger than expected, it feels like I'm swimming in the robe but I am 5"3 and about 103 lbs. Very warm, soft and comfy though. After a year of use and washing, the material is still as soft as when I first got it. Good quality. Great blanket alternative when its cold!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: The robe is very nice quality. The only complaint I have is that it’s huge! I actually feel like I’m wrapped in a blanket wearing it. It’s big in the arms and all around. When I tie it, can’t even get it tight. If it were white, i’d feel like a giant marshmallow. I bought the smallest size available and it’s much too big.
customer_reviews.author: Ohkellygirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is over sized as stated in the actual size chart. My wife absolutely loves it for our cool winter weather. Her words: it's very plush, fluffy, comfortable, warm, cozy, awesome, great color, double belt loops, functions well as a blanket when falling asleep in the living room. She even wears it outside sitting on the porch instead of a coat. Usually she doesn't like things too warm, but she loves her new pink robe! She said I did well picking out this great robe so I get 5 stars too!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dob

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for mother's day. She has been complaining she can not find a thick warm rob. I took the chance and bought this one off line. I was a little worried but my mom loves it. She had to take it off it was too warm but will be great in the winter as we live in Pittsburgh. If anybody is on the fence just buy itbyounwont be disappointed it's worth the price. I got a small and it fit her perfect as she is a tiny woman.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred M Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this robe because I was going to the hospital for kidney surgery and needed something to wear that would be warm, but loose and comfortable. I really didn't know what to expect. It came and I was so excited. It's a huge, fluffy, soft, warm robe. It's big and comfy. I got so many compliments at the hospital. I love it. Its like being surrounded by a warm, soft, cocoon. One of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Short arms
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves were way too short with the cuff ending about 5 inches too short on my arm. The cuff was sewn in so it could not be unrolled to lengthen it. Leaving at half unrolled to try and cover part of my arm looked ridiculous. I ended up returning it even though it was incredibly soft.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfan74

customer_reviews.title: Recipient fell in love with it and wore it over her clothes Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS. Simply lush, plush, soft...can I get a bed made of this, please? Recipient fell in love with it and wore it over her clothes Christmas day lol. Pay attn to sizing. She is 4'11 and wears 2X tops. The Large/XLarge fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: nitaell72

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, warmand fluffy robe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic robe! I bought the size small and am 5'4", 130lbs. This robe was a little roomy (which I like) with an inside tie and two belt loops (one higher than the other for taller folks). Love the coziness of this very fluffy robe! I felt cocooned in warmth and softness!
customer_reviews.author: Patski

customer_reviews.title: Big, fuzzy, soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the winter months. We finally had a couple of colder days where I could actually put it on. It is very warm. I washed it first and was expecting a lint trap full of green fuzz but was pleasantly surprised that there was very little cast off. It is also cat approved and if I leave it draped over the foot board I will come back to find that she has pulled it over to make a nest. Thankfully I got it 2 sizes larger than I actually wear so there is enough for both of us. I also like that it has patch pockets.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The heck with style, this will not be worn to opera night! Warm, which is crucial where we live, and soft and comfy. This robe is now a staple of my mornings. Perfect length for 5’6” which is hard to get as normal long robes go to the floor and the shorts are not warm enough. Call this a “short-long” which, again, is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Yolander

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy attractive robe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. She loves how it is “so warm and fuzzy inside and out”. She is about 275 lbs so I purchased the xxx-large/xxxx-large. She said this was too big but she doesn’t want to exchange because she loves how she can snuggle up in it when she is in her recliner. But be sure to know this is the largest size. Again, she Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tanney

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and warm
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for sexy, keep looking. If you are looking for a light weight, warm and super soft robe that you can snuggle into, this is it! I’ve had mine for several weeks now and love it! Seems to be well made. The only problem I am having is that I hate to take it off to get dressed in the morning.....
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: Went by size chart which stated based on my wife's ...
customer_reviews.text: Went by size chart which stated based on my wife's measurements she would take a L/XL but it was at least 2 sizes too big. I which China would figure out American sizes and make them accordingly. I'm sure most of their clothing products are purchased by the US so they should have an US size chart and a Asian size chart instead of telling you to get a size or two larger.
customer_reviews.author: Clothesguru

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Great robe, Nice length - I am 5'8" and it comes down to my mid-shin easy (after I washed it, mind you). Comfy, warm, cute. I got the pink and love it. Love that it has the "shag" longer hair fibers. My husband bought the big/tall men's robe with the hood and he loves it as well. No complaints from either of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: It's warm...but really big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my husband bought the same brand a couple of years back and I love his robe. His was discontinued so I had to find one for me. I wear a L, pushing XL. I got the XL-XXL because it was the only size available. It swallows me. I could fit two of me in there. Not complaining but when I start really losing weight, it's not going to fit at all. It is very soft, plush and washes well without the colors fading onto other fabrics. I'll shop around a bit more before I buy another one. Overall, it's a good robe. Just too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Unusually good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most "bathrobes', this one lasts (after two years or so still like new - both mine and my wife's0. I would have expected this quality in the 1940s or 1950s - for the 2010s, it is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Karl May

customer_reviews.title: Would give 10 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cozy, long beautiful robe. The white and blue mix to form a beautiful color. The photo doesnt do it justice. The robe is longer than most robes which is what we desired. I would imagine someone exactly 5 feet , the robe would reach the floor. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miessner

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very warm, cozy, and soft. My wife says it feels like a hug. However, runs big. We ordered her a size S/M, and it is a solid L by the way it fits her (she's 5'6', 126lb, bust 35'). Washes well in the washer and dryer, but, as expected, loses fluffiness of the look.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: You won't want to take this robe off!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying....YES it does run large! I am a size 4 and ordered the small-med. I typically order robes a size larger because I like them to fit roomy. This fits perfect for me...if you are looking for a soft smooshy robe to cuddle up in when you get home! Can't wait to get home from work tonight to put my robe and plushy slippers on with a glass of wine! Quality is amazing for this price...super soft and not thin! Victoria's Secret would charge $100 for this same robe! I ordered the teal for Fall/Winter........may need the baby blue for Spring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service-amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and guessed at a size - it was too large but this robe was so amazing I immediately reordered in the correct size. They were so great about returning the first one. Quality of item is A+!! I would definetly order again and would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: debora rycraft

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: She looks great in this, and she loves how the soft inner lining feels against all of her skin while sitting on the deck. Plus the soft material makes undoing the tie quick and easy when needed :)
customer_reviews.author: MILFAllDay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Love the Color (Purple 2 Tone).
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe! Very comfortable and has two levels for the sash (highest one fits me best, being 5'6" tall). Does run large but that is what I wanted. I have a lightweight and tighter one for warmer weather (I live in the DFW metroplex (Texas, USA).
customer_reviews.author: Daniella L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for christmas. The reviews were incredibly helpful. She loves it and wears it around the house constantly! She’s always cold so it was a natural solution to not having to wear a blanket 24/7. It’s big, it’s cozy, it’s warm and I use it when she’s not around too.
customer_reviews.author: Brett joel lee

customer_reviews.title: OK plus
customer_reviews.text: I do like this robe, but the color is more raspberry than maroon or wine or whatever I was expecting... and it's thinner than the one it's replacing. It's warm enough and comfy enough for the price, but I can't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every penny! This is the plushest, most comfortable and warm bathrobe I've owned. The pastel colors are beautiful. Thick, incredibly soft, yet not heavy. If I could rationalize it, I'd buy one in every color.
customer_reviews.author: maudiehorse

customer_reviews.title: Still ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Two years after buying!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe 2 years ago! I love it!! It’s still fluffy, warm and snuggly. It is a little bulky but I love it so much! We live in Iowa and it gets really cold. I’ve washed this robe more times than I could tell you and it’s still perfect! It’s super cute too! Best robe I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this is the best robe I ever bought. It fits perfect and it is so so comfortable. Absolutely gorgeous. I truly recommend this robe if you love being comfortable and cozy. I will definitely be ordering at least 3 more in other colors. I bought the burgundy color. Very true to the color. I love it . Thank you to Alexander Del Rossi great job and great robe. I’m so big on comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.K

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable. After having to send back several other robes ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable. After having to send back several other robes because the size was far too big, I ordered a much smaller size for this one. It's now slightly small, but that's my fault not the sizing. The robe is thin. I wanted it to be a little more cushy. It's soft and warm, but not so snugly.
customer_reviews.author: kunoichi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sooo much. I am a size S/M and ordered an XL because I wanted extra fluff. Ohh I got it. This this is so beautiful, soft, and durable. I’ve washed it a few times with no issues. My cats really enjoy snuggling on it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but returned.
customer_reviews.text: The color I bought was a pretty rose, but I returned it. It was HUGE, too big and longer than what feels comfortable on me. I'm short. It's quite thick if that's what you're looking for. Not me though. Nice pockets and sturdy wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J.

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these robes for myself and one for my daughter and I must say they are the best robes we’ve ever had! They are thick and very soft, even after washing. They fit just the way a robe should - extra room but not too much. This robe has turned out to be one of my favourite things to relax in!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Not so satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday packed in an Amazon and inside of a ripped plastic bag. I could tell this has been returned by some other customer. I didn't like that the least and wanted to return it immediately. However, my daughter loved it and wants to keep it. It's a very soft synthetic material but I'm waiting to see how it looks when I wash it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA M PICADO

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. She loves it. It's warm, cozy, feels think and looks great on her. She's 5'10" and slim and the S/M fits and is just the right length. I would buy this again if they offer more colors.
customer_reviews.author: blueplateradio

customer_reviews.title: too cosy to be true
customer_reviews.text: It is so soft and comfortable you don't want to take it off and very warm when I ordered I made a mistake and ordered the large size which was really too big for me me but instead of sending it back my husband decided to leave it for himself and I ordered a second one because they are so soft and so pleasant to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but runs really small...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a small in everything, but like robes to be a little big on me; they're just more comfortable that way. So I ordered a L/XL thinking it would be just right. It is WAY too small! It goes around me but there is little overlap, and the sleeves don't have much extra room. I am returning this and have reordered in an XXL. It is a very soft, luxurious, plush robe, otherwise I would just return it & not bother to reorder. Because the fabric is just so heavenly though, I have reordered. If you order this, it is definitely worth the money (also launders up nicely), but just remember to really order up!
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedMonster

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for a bathrobe I could put on right out of the shower. This robe was not absorbent(maybe it wasn't supposed to be?) and it is huge and bulky. I am keeping it cuz it'll be great for the winter and I just want to wrap up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe. VERY warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice robe. The large fits a bit big (I’m 5’9) but I prefer it that way. It keeps you EXTREMELY warm.... I’m always cold but sometimes this robe is actually too much to bear! Winter is coming, it will be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a plain fleece robe that fit me in stores. This one is perfect. I haven't washed it yet, so fingers crossed. I wear it around the house in the evening for hours. So snuggly!
customer_reviews.author: E. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Blanket robe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lived in this nearly every single day since I bought it 3 months ago. It feels like a Snuggie that I wear on my back instead of my front. If you’re the kind of person who always uses a blanket on the couch/always runs cold, get this. It’s quite big on me, even for the smallest size. It hits about 3 inches above my ankles and I’m 5’2. Good thing I like living in blankets like a burrito.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm but murky color
customer_reviews.text: It is as fluffy and plush as hoped. The color was a bit murky, coming off as a muddled grey instead of lavender, but it's so soft and warm. It was a gift and my mother definitely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ohmgawdwtf

customer_reviews.title: Extra warm cozy thick robe
customer_reviews.text: If u need a robe for extremely cold temps this is a great one for you or if u don’t want to turn up your thermostat. I’ve never felt such thick fleece - even te belt is super soft and THICK! LOVE LOVE LIVE IT! Please order a size down as they run big.
customer_reviews.author: divika

customer_reviews.title: Quality control problem prevents five-star rating
customer_reviews.text: Plush, warm, comfortable, fits well and looks nice. But! One came with the seam on the left sleeve coming undone. No big deal, just order a replacement, right? Well, that one arrived with the exact same problem! So the choice was either send them both back or pay to have the seams repaired. (I paid for the repairs, on both of them.)
customer_reviews.author: J. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Great robe!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I bought it for my picky tween and she LOVES it! There’s definitely room for her to grow into it, but the small size worked perfectly. Looks exactly like the picture. Cute, cozy, very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Lola's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: This feels like a fluffy cloud hug
customer_reviews.text: This robe is so soft, so light, so cute.... I am in love love LOVE!! And the price is right. Treat yourself! You deserve a fluffy cloud hug which is what this feels like
customer_reviews.author: EmR

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Mom
customer_reviews.text: I have this robe and love it. The superb quality and well made construction of this robe make it a favorite of mine. The fleece is instantly warm, and very deep. I ordered a second for my mom for Christmas, and she said, "it's fantastic!" (Which is a lot, coming from her). She's only 5'3" and I am 5'8", so it looks longer on her, like in the picture. It is plenty long enough on me and I wear extra long pajamas to keep my legs warm. It's perfect, and if it ever wears out, I hope I can order another.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love it💓
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Well worth the money. I bought it extra big, just in case it was to shrink some when washed. Quality is 100% for the price. Seems to be made very well 2 big pockets that holds alot. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice weier

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and incorrectly sized.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise for my girlfriend's birthday and it definitely was a surprise...not in a good way. When first opened, it was so soft and luxurious. Then she tried it on and was very disappointed. She's consistently a size large/extra large and yet it fits a 6'5" man. Completely disappointed at the sizing. I then tried to return it and unfortunately was offered a refund of 6 dollars less than I bought it for. Definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: edward gayewski

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you go really big for the size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her birthday, and it's a really nice robe; it's thick and very soft and comfortable. Be sure that you buy it big, though; where she'd normally buy clothes in a medium to large depending on sizing, I bought this in a 3X/4X and it fits like the pictures show despite going for at least a few sizes too big (robes should be big and comfy, right?). Very nice robe, and she's happy with it, but be careful with the sizing when ordering and go much bigger with it than you'd think you need if you want it to fit loosely.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it. Very warm and soft. It is a good winter robe. This brand runs a little large so you may have to size down. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my wife. It is soft and fluffy and fits well. She likes it, but we aren't sure how well it will wash. Guess we will see.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is good. Stitching is good. It's very soft! It has worn well over a year and is still as soft as when I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: She wanted a robe and I gave her this. It's a really good quality robe at this price. Fabric is good. Stitching is good. It's very soft! It has worn well over a year and is still as soft as when I bought it. And she looks great in it. A great robe for a gift or just to fill your robe needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful robe!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is the best thing ever! It is super soft and warm. It also doesn’t shed in the washing machine. Great buy! I’m going to buy some additional ones as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5520

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use when getting out of the shower and relaxing in the living room before getting fully dressed and I love it. After reading a lot of the reviews I was super worried as some say it fell apart but I have been washing mine 3 times a week and have not had any problems yet. The size does seem to be a little big but I did ask for the biggest size just so I could use it as a blanket/robe. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Way too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife since it looks really warm, comfy and stylish. When we received it, my wife tried it on and it looked like she could wear it out in a blizzard. It was so bulky and the material is so thick that it was a very unflattering look. Yes, it is warm and soft, but it's a bad fit. And sizing down a little wouldn't have helped as the design and material just adds a lot of bulk.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and warm, but larger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I tried to be conscientous about the size and read the reviews and what others thought about the fit of the robe, but it turns out that that XL was too large for my wife. Now, what she wanted it for was to not get cold after a shower and for that, it's been great! She has no plans on leaving the bedroom with it, so the fact that it's too big isn't a huge deal. It's very warm and she's glad we got it! I wonder how well it will hold up after 6 months. The pile is so thick that I could see it looking crushed. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando in Co

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! I love this robe. I bought it a size larger than I would typically wear, but it is roomy in case I want to keep a bed jacket on when wearing. It is the softest ever. I had bought another brand, which had been at the hotel spa I was staying at thinking it would be the same soft robe. It was not. Del Rossa fills the bill at about half the cost. I bought another one in a different style and am very happy!! Am thinking this would make wonderful and affordable Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.author: Writernan

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfy, snuggly soft robe I have ever felt! Excellent quality & I love the color. Good deal. Definitely will keep you toasty warm!
customer_reviews.author: MizKatty

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, Soft Robe
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this robe for me for Mother's Day. To be honest, I really did not need another robe and I was thinking I will send it back. Once I received it, I was in love with it! The best fitting, softest robe I have owned. I like my robes big and cozy! It is a thick (not heavy) robe so unless you are cold all of the time like me you may want to save for winter. You will love it I promise! Mine is purple! Great gift for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill DeCarlis

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Love this, was a bit worried after some of the reviews, but gosh it's beautiful and soo fluffy and comfortable.. I LOVE it..it's perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My opinion on product
customer_reviews.text: My first actual clothing purchase online. I do like the material a lot. It's very comfortable and soft. I was VERY disappointed with the craftsmanship. The pocket, when it arrived, was falling off. Multiple strings hanging. Considering I paid much more than I normally would have, I felt I didn't get what I paid for. I tend to buy the most inexpensive and softest robes in store. My last one lasted me nearly 5 years and to have this one arrive already defective was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: num1_angel

customer_reviews.title: sizes are made bigger than the chart recommends!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used the sizing chart to purchase this rob for me.... OMG.... I put it on and suddenly I was wrapped in a king size comforter!!! We returned it.... I told him not to buy another one, since there is no way to get the correct size using their chart.
customer_reviews.author: mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this robe as a gift for my niece. She loved it, and she used it the very day we gave it to her. It is warm and very comfortable. it has an inside tie that helps keep it closed in addition to the belt. It runs somewhat large, in my opinion. We bought the size S/M, and I think that if you are really small, say size 6 or less, you may swim in this robe. My niece is about a size 10, and it seemed a bit large even on her. Other than that, this robe is great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blaine

customer_reviews.title: It is long and a bit big for a 5'1" 38" bust 100lbs
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1" and weigh 100lbs...it goes to my ankles and well drag on the floor if I bend over so it could have been about 2" to 3" shorter and still would have loved it. It is a very cozy and plush robe and that was what I wanted. I am not sure how it washes yet and hope I can update once I do wash it. It could fall apart or shed...?
customer_reviews.author: S. Black Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Labeled wrong size on robe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small/medium and it was HUGE... I estimate it’s at least an XXL ..The shoulders could fit a male linebacker. Maybe it got labeled wrong. As far as the quality...the fabric seemed thinner than I expected also.
customer_reviews.author: MAWrph

customer_reviews.title: How is it soooo cozy!? *Hearts*
customer_reviews.text: I just love this robe. It's definitely not a "sexy" robe, but it is the coziest robe. I'm 4'11" and got a medium to so I could fully sink into the robe. It hits below my knees because I'm short, so if you're maybe under 5'5" it will be pretty long on you. Washing it kind of hard because it's so fluffy, but make sure to dry on low heat and it will be as fluffy as when you got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, fits great, perfect length. I was worried about length because my mom is short but it went a 5-6” below her knees. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: You feel loved when you wear this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas - it came in a package that was so small, I thought that can't possibly be the bathrobe and if it is, it's got to be a very small cheap bathrobe. I was pleasantly surprised. The bathrobe was in the box, however, I took it out and took it out of the plastic bag and it fluffed right up and no fuzz balls dropping all over the floor. My mom was so excited to wear it, and it is soft, she wears it almost every day. She felt like she was enveloped in love. Was pretty cool. Great robe and a great price. I especially liked the pink.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: Expected better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift and I'm really disappointed. WAY too big. Might work better for a couple to share! My daughter is 5'4" and hem drags on the floor! I used their size chart too! Also, it's very stretchy and shapeless. Takes Shaggy to a whole new level!
customer_reviews.author: bonnied

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest size and I'm swimming in it. That is A ok. Ive recently decided that I'm going to live out the rest of my days in this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Super plush and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she practically live in it! Super plush and stands up well, wash after wash. It definitely runs small, so buy at least one size up. You need room to wrap and tie. Based on her daily wear, this ranks really high. I am buying her a new one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe
customer_reviews.text: This robe is a life saver. It is so soft and warm. I love to snuggle in it as much as I can. My house gets really cold and we don't want to run the heat all the time so this robe has been the perfect solution. We got my husband one too! I got a purple one and it looked more muted online. In person it was really bright. But I just wear it at home so who cares. If I could go back I would get a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Allison McClain

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly warm!
customer_reviews.text: Got a small/medium based on reviews and it is ginormous! Very cozy and thick - feels like I'm wearing a big fur. I like it for the coziness, but it is not real flattering and makes me look huge. Good for hanging out having coffee in the morning but not the kind of robe you would wear if you are wanting to attract a mate!
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: More of a queens robe! My girls love them!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER PLUSH! Bought two of these for my girls and they walk around on cold mornings and weekends like queens in these luxurious robes!! Im jealous! They say they are very comfortable and warm. Not for summer wear!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The shoulders of the robe in 2. 5 times ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoulders of the robe in 2.5 times more, and sleeves start from the elbow.I use it as a blanket. Not yet washed.Wash off the paint or not, I don't know yet.My size 3x.
customer_reviews.author: Liudmila

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: My wife is about 5.3 and loved the length of this robe. Besides being the right length she adored the softness.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: The color is great! It is very warm, soft, and fluffy. I love my robes to be a couple of sizes too big so that it wraps around me like a blanket. I wear this robe pretty much every night around the house.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalGirl77

customer_reviews.title: Super fluffy.  Definitely not for summer
customer_reviews.text: This is the FLUFFIEST robe I have ever seen. Definitely not lightweight. I’ll be saving this one for winter for sure..
customer_reviews.author: Maine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, she loves it but she says it is very very warm. So it’s hard to wear around the house for any period of time without over heating. But overall she thinks it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: joshua Cook

customer_reviews.title: Aside from feeling like I am Barney when I wear this robe
customer_reviews.text: I had asked for a blue robe, but had this one marked on my wish list! Aside from feeling like I am Barney when I wear this robe, I do love it. It runs large, but extremely cozy and comfy. It washes well and stays soft after being washed. It lays bulky but when wanting to snuggle in like a huge blanket it is easy to look past that, very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rena C

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but big
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe . I usually wear 1X/2X but wanted it big enough... Made a mistake - the 3X is HUGE. It is really pretty - fluffy, very plush, and quite well made. Had to return it for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Received a (wrong colored) returned sample in torn packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Bathrobe appeared to be a return from someone else and was in open packaging. It was also not the color/pattern that I had ordered. The only reason I’m keeping it is because my husband already cut the tags off so I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife = happy life
customer_reviews.text: I knew my wife wanted a new robe, but I had NO IDEA she would love this thing SO MUCH! She said it's like getting inside a cuddly toy and being hugged all over. Whatever that means. I bought her tickets to New York, too, but it's the robe that's getting all the comments. Whomever said "I'm average sized but needed a Large" is correct - the robe is sized a little smaller than it realistically is, so bear that in mind when ordering. Either way - just get one and enjoy those brownie points <3
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The robe runs big for me.
customer_reviews.text: The robe is very soft and comfortable but it is to big. I ordered a S/M but it’s more on the medium size than small. It rapped around me twice.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Only 3days HAPPY! HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: Like ....package, arrived on time Color love, love,oversize & long Soft..so soft!! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: famly1lv

customer_reviews.title: Good robe, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, and first went with the Large / XL, due to many saying it was smaller than expected. The large was too large - the wrists extended past her hands, too large around the waist, etc. We got the small / medium as a replacement, and it is the right fit - the arms are the right length, and it fits well over pajamas. I'm very pleased with the experience and the easy return policy - we actually had both robes in the house for a day, so we could be sure we made the right choice, and used the shipping bag and pre-paid label to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic robe! Got as a gift and ended up ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic robe! Got as a gift and ended up getting a second one as a back up. LOVES this robe and said it is the best robe she has ever had. Very soft & perfect width/length. Not too tight in the waist so you can wear clothes underneath. Lightweight, but very fluffy and plush. Not thin like some can be. I highly recommend this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Size S/M runs VERY LARGE; even for unisex sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5'2, wife. I though the S/M would be a good fit. I assumed the woman in the picture implies the robe was in women's sizing. Once the robe arrived, it was way to big for her. Out of curiosity, I also tried it on. the S/M fit me at 5'9" 190lbs. The quality did seem nice and as described; hence the 4 star rating, just be aware, the sizing is not what I expected; it appeared to be unopened but perhaps it was mis-marked. Glad Amazon offered free shipping/returns on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Jay

customer_reviews.title: it is very comfortable, if not super soft
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is very comfortable, if not super soft. It was dramatically larger than I'd expected - I look like a Woolley mammoth with this thing on. I call it my Jon Snow cloak - think I may return it though as it's not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Geroux

customer_reviews.title: Felt like the description was a little misleading once I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not call this microfiber. The material is cheap feeling and looking. It is a think warm robe, but not what I think of as "plush" or microfiber material. Felt like the description was a little misleading once I got to see it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Alexander Del Rossa Women's Plush Fleece Robe, Warm Long Hair Shaggy Bathrobe
feature_bullets: RISK FREE GUARANTEE - We know that one of the biggest drawbacks to buying clothes online is the fact that you can't try the product in person - that is why we absorb that risk for you. Order this plush robe now and if you are not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked.

WARM AND PLUSH - This warm robe for women is made from plush 270 GSM velveteen fleece to keep you warm no matter how low the temperature drops. Enjoy the comfort of plush microfiber fleece every day as part of your morning and evening routine.
LARGE POCKETS - This plush robe features two large pockets that are big enough for your phone and warm enough for your hands.
INNER AND OUTER TIES - This robe features an inside tie closure to keep your robe secure no matter how you twist, turn, or bend and an adjustable outer belt tie for a perfect fit.

GIVE THE GIFT OF RELAXATION - A comfortable robe is a thoughtful way of telling her "You deserve to relax" - making it the perfect present for Christmas, Mother's Day or her birthday. Our robes are folded packaged neatly making them easy to wrap for a nice presentation.
